name: Throb of Lovegirl: A Ero Waifu TD
name_original: Throb of Lovegirl: A Ero Waifu TD
description:
🔞 A roguelite tower defense game where you help Alpha the warrior in her battles!



Travel the world fighting with the Alpha army, dominate the battlefield strategically positioning your soldiers

Features

• Choose your path in each game where each terrain has advantages and disadvantages.

• More than 20 types of soldiers with unique abilities that will help you in battle.

• Equip your soldiers with a variety of more than 50 weapons divided into pistols, rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, sniper rifles and bazookas.
• 10 unlockable waifu superpowers.
